QuestData.Title: The Quarry Quandary
QuestData.Description: Now that our arsenal is built we need a skilled smith to operate it.$b$bWe recently caught an Iron Horde deserter who claims he used to be one of the Blackrock's best iron workers.$b$bNormally I'd ignore the ravings of a captive, but the weapons we took out of his pack had the finest workmanship I've ever seen.$b$bCommander, I think we should see if he's as good as he claims.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Morketh Bladehowl within Vol'jin's Pride in Talador.
QuestData.RewardText: You're the one in charge around here, right? I've heard the guards talk about your exploits and if I wasn't looking at you now I'd swear they were lying.$b$bI've only ever wanted to make the finest blades and put them in the hands of the strongest of fighters. I can tell already that you're exactly the type I want to carry my weapons.$b$bIf you can give me a chance I swear you will not be disappointed.
